summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing of RFID Cloud API system. All 19 test cases passed successfully including device registration, authentication, RFID readings, heartbeat, and admin management functions.
passed_tests: Health check endpoint (/health) - API and database healthy
Admin device registration - Handles existing and new devices
Admin device listing - Returns registered devices
Admin device details - Retrieves specific device info
Device authentication - JWT token generation working
Device configuration retrieval - Cloud config distribution working
RFID readings submission - Batch readings accepted
RFID readings query - Data retrieval working
Device revocation - Admin can revoke device access
Device reinstatement - Admin can restore device access
Authentication security - Proper rejection of invalid credentials
Authorization security - Proper API key and JWT validation
Error handling - Correct HTTP status codes and error messages
